title: Why is Ap miss fortune considered a bad/troll pick?
body:
I just dont undestand. She got Ap ratios on 3 out of 4 skills, the dmg is just absurd if you can land a e + r combo, ppl often doesnt know how to play against it so that's a huge advantage for the player, and still ppl thinks it's a troll pick. I stayed on team builder for 50+min, constantly getting kicked [ and luckly found a group that allowed me to stay ] and getting told "ap mf is a troll pick, gtfo"

"But she is supposed to be a adc" Ap tristana says hello to you my friend

Yet, Ap tristana is not a troll pick and is a "kill or be killed" mage, while Ap miss fortune can safely poke from afar and dodge skillshots thanks to her passive.
